Original_Text: SAN FRANCISCO (Reuters) - Apple Inc. announced a new software update for its cloud platform, enhancing data encryption to address growing cybersecurity demands.
NEW YORK - JPMorgan Chase & Co. reported a 10 percent increase in quarterly profits, driven by strong performance in its investment banking division.
LONDON (Reuters) - A British biotech firm secured funding to develop a new gene-editing tool aimed at treating rare genetic disorders.
TOKYO - Toyota Motor Corp. unveiled plans to expand its electric vehicle production, targeting a 20 percent increase in output by 2027.
BOSTON - A startup launched a quantum computing platform to accelerate drug discovery, partnering with major pharmaceutical companies.
HONG KONG - Cathay Pacific Airways announced a fleet upgrade, investing $1.5 billion in fuel-efficient aircraft to reduce operational costs.
SEATTLE - Amazon Web Services introduced a new machine learning service to optimize supply chain management for retail clients.
FRANKFURT - Deutsche Telekom AG agreed to acquire a regional internet provider to expand its broadband network across Europe.
SHANGHAI (Reuters) - A Chinese tech company unveiled a prototype for a self-driving delivery vehicle, aiming for deployment in urban areas by 2026.
CHICAGO - Boeing Co. secured a $3 billion contract to supply commercial jets to a major Asian airline, boosting its order backlog.
